Summary: I was sitting outside with a friend and we both seen a bright orange circle in the sky. Total of 6 flew by about 10 seconds apart, no sound.
trends: There have been 55 other sightings in Ottawa
There were no other sightings in Ottawa on or around August 3rd 2013
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting outside with a friend and we both seen a bright orange circle to the right of us in the sky. We didn't know what it was, it was flying slowly through the sky. At first we seen one, but quickly after another was following its path, leading to a totally of six orange bright lights following each other in the same direction, about 10 seconds apart. We were really confused as to what this was and afraid at the same time. We lost sight over the circles when we could no longer see them because of the houses.
